original: Milindapañha
analyzed: milindapañha

original: Meṇḍakapañha
analyzed: meṇḍakapañha

original: Iddhibalavagga
analyzed: iddhi bala vagga

original: 4. Pathavicalanapañha
“Bhante nāgasena, bhāsitampetaṁ bhagavatā—
analyzed: bhante nāgasena bhāsitam petam bhagavatā

original: ‘aṭṭhime, bhikkhave, hetū aṭṭha paccayā mahato bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāyā’ti.
analyzed: aṭṭhime bhikkhave hetū aṭṭha paccayāḥ mahataḥ bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāya ati

original: Asesavacanaṁ idaṁ, nissesavacanaṁ idaṁ, nippariyāyavacanaṁ idaṁ, natthañño navamo hetu mahato bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāya.
analyzed: asesa vacanam nissesa vacanam ida nippariyāya vacanam navamaḥ hetu mahataḥ bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāya

original: Yadi, bhante nāgasena, añño navamo hetu bhaveyya mahato bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāya, tampi hetuṁ bhagavā katheyya.
analyzed: yadi bhante nāgasena aññaḥ navamaḥ hetu bhaveyya mahataḥ bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāya tam pi hetum bhagavā katheyya

original: Yasmā ca kho, bhante nāgasena, natthañño navamo hetu mahato bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāya,
analyzed: yasmai ca kho bhante nāgasena natthaññaḥ navamaḥ hetu mahataḥ bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāya

original: tasmā anācikkhito bhagavatā, ayañca navamo hetu dissati mahato bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāya,
analyzed: tasmai an ācikkhitaḥ bhagavatā ayañca navamaḥ hetu dissati mahataḥ bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāya

original: yaṁ vessantarena raññā mahādāne dīyamāne sattakkhattuṁ mahāpathavī kampitāti.
analyzed: yam vessantarena raññā mahā dāne dīyamāne satta kkhattum mahā pathavī kampitā ati

original: Yadi, bhante nāgasena, aṭṭheva hetū aṭṭha paccayā mahato bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāya,
analyzed: yadi bhante nāgasena aṭṭha iva hetū aṭṭha paccayāḥ mahataḥ bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāya

original: tena hi vessantarena raññā mahādāne dīyamāne sattakkhattuṁ mahāpathavī kampitāti
analyzed: tena hi vessantarena raññā mahā dāne dīyamāne satta kkhattum mahā pathavī kampitā ati

original: yaṁ vacanaṁ, taṁ micchā.
analyzed: yam tam micchā

original: Yadi vessantarena raññā mahādāne dīyamāne sattakkhattuṁ mahāpathavī kampitā, tena hi aṭṭheva hetū aṭṭha paccayā mahato bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāyāti tampi vacanaṁ micchā.
analyzed: yadi vessantarena raññā mahā dāne dīyamāne satta kkhattum mahā pathavī kampitā tena hi aṭṭha iva hetū aṭṭha paccayāḥ mahataḥ bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāya ati tat pi vacanam micchā

original: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho sukhumo dunniveṭhiyo andhakaraṇo ceva gambhīro ca, so tavānuppatto, neso aññena ittarapaññena sakkā visajjetuṁ aññatra tavādisena buddhimatā”ti.
analyzed: ayam pi ubhatas koṭikaḥ pañho sukhumaḥ dunniveṭhiyaḥ andha karaṇo ca iva gambhīro ca so tava anuppattaḥ na isaḥ aññena ittarapaññena sakkā visajjetum aññatra tava ādisena buddhimatā ati

original: “Bhāsitampetaṁ, mahārāja, bhagavatā—
analyzed: mahā rāja bhagavatā

original: ‘aṭṭhime, bhikkhave, hetū aṭṭha paccayā mahato bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāyā’ti.
analyzed: aṭṭhime bhikkhave hetū aṭṭha paccayāḥ mahataḥ bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāya ati

original: Yaṁ vessantarena raññā mahādāne dīyamāne sattakkhattuṁ mahāpathavī kampitā, tañca pana akālikaṁ kadācuppattikaṁ aṭṭhahi hetūhi vippamuttaṁ, tasmā agaṇitaṁ aṭṭhahi hetūhi.
analyzed: yam vessantarena raññā mahā dāne dīyamāne satta kkhattum mahā pathavī kampitā tat ca pana akālikam kadācuppattikam aṭṭhahi hetūhi vippamutta tasmai agaṇitam aṭṭhahi hetūhi

original: Yathā, mahārāja, loke tayoyeva meghā gaṇīyanti vassiko hemantiko pāvusakoti.
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja loke tayaḥ yā iva meghāḥ gaṇīyanti vassikaḥ hemantikaḥ pāvusakaḥ ti

original: Yadi te muñcitvā añño megho pavassati, na so megho gaṇīyati sammatehi meghehi, akālameghotveva saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
analyzed: yadi te muñcitvā aññaḥ megho pavassati na saḥ meghaḥ gaṇīyati sammatehi meghehi akāla megho tvā iva saṅkham gacchati

original: Evameva kho, mahārāja, vessantarena raññā mahādāne dīyamāne yaṁ sattakkhattuṁ mahāpathavī
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja vessantarena raññā mahā dāne dīyamāne yam satta kkhattum mahā pathavī

original: kampitā, akālikaṁ etaṁ kadācuppattikaṁ aṭṭhahi hetūhi vippamuttaṁ, na taṁ gaṇīyati aṭṭhahi hetūhi.
analyzed: kampitā akālikam etam kadācuppattikam aṭṭhahi hetūhi vippamutta na tam gaṇīyati aṭṭhahi hetūhi

original: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, himavantā pabbatā pañca nadisatāni sandanti, tesaṁ, mahārāja, pañcannaṁ nadisatānaṁ daseva nadiyo nadigaṇanāya gaṇīyanti.
analyzed: yathā vā pana mahā rāja himavantā pabbatā pañca nadi satāni sandanti mahā rāja pañcannam nadi satānam dasā iva nadiyaḥ nadi gaṇanāya gaṇīyanti

original: Seyyathidaṁ—
analyzed: seyyathida

original: gaṅgā yamunā aciravatī sarabhū mahī sindhu sarassatī vetravatī vītaṁsā candabhāgāti, avasesā nadiyo nadigaṇanāya agaṇitā.
analyzed: gaṅgā yamunā aciravatī sarabhū mahī sindhu sarassatī vetravatī vītasā candabhāgā ati avasesāḥ nadiyaḥ nadi gaṇanāya agaṇitā

original: Kiṁ kāraṇā?
analyzed: kim kāraṇā

original: Na tā nadiyo dhuvasalilā.
analyzed: na tāḥ nadiyaḥ dhuva salilā

original: Evameva kho, mahārāja, vessantarena raññā mahādāne dīyamāne yaṁ sattakkhattuṁ mahāpathavī
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja vessantarena raññā mahā dāne dīyamāne yam satta kkhattum mahā pathavī

original: kampitā, akālikaṁ etaṁ kadācuppattikaṁ aṭṭhahi hetūhi vippamuttaṁ, na taṁ gaṇīyati aṭṭhahi hetūhi.
analyzed: kampitā akālikam etam kadācuppattikam aṭṭhahi hetūhi vippamutta na tam gaṇīyati aṭṭhahi hetūhi

original: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, rañño satampi dvisatampi tisatampi amaccā honti, tesaṁ chayeva janā amaccagaṇanāya gaṇīyanti.
analyzed: yathā vā pana mahā rāja rañño satam pi dvisatam pi tisatam pi amaccāḥ honti tesam chayā iva janāḥ amacca gaṇanāya gaṇīyanti

original: Seyyathidaṁ—
analyzed: seyyathida

original: senāpati purohito akkhadasso bhaṇḍāgāriko chattaggāhako khaggaggāhako.
analyzed: senāpati purohitaḥ akkhadassaḥ bhaṇḍāgāriko chatta ggāhako khagga ggāhako

original: Eteyeva amaccagaṇanāya gaṇīyanti.
analyzed: a macca gaṇanāya

original: Kiṁ kāraṇā?
analyzed: kim kāraṇā

original: Yuttattā rājaguṇehi, avasesā agaṇitā, sabbe amaccātveva saṅkhaṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: rāja guṇehi avasesāḥ agaṇitā sabbe saṅkham gacchanti

original: Evameva kho, mahārāja, vessantarena raññā mahādāne dīyamāne yaṁ sattakkhattuṁ mahāpathavī
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja vessantarena raññā mahā dāne dīyamāne yam satta kkhattum mahā pathavī

original: kampitā, akālikaṁ etaṁ kadācuppattikaṁ aṭṭhahi hetūhi vippamuttaṁ, na taṁ gaṇīyati aṭṭhahi hetūhi.
analyzed: kampitā akālikam etam kadācuppattikam aṭṭhahi hetūhi vippamutta na tam gaṇīyati aṭṭhahi hetūhi

original: Suyyati nu kho, mahārāja, etarahi jinasāsane katādhikārānaṁ diṭṭhadhammasukhavedanīyakammaṁ, kitti ca yesaṁ abbhuggatā devamanussesū”ti?
analyzed: suyyati nu kho mahā rāja etarahi jina sāsane kata adhikārānam diṭṭhadhamma sukha vedanīya kamma kitti ca yesam abbhuggatāḥ deva manussesu ti

original: “Āma, bhante, suyyati etarahi jinasāsane katādhikārānaṁ diṭṭhadhammasukhavedanīyakammaṁ, kitti ca yesaṁ abbhuggatā devamanussesu satta janāti”.
analyzed: āma bhante suyyati etarahi jina sāsane kata adhikārānam diṭṭhadhamma sukha vedanīya kamma ca yesam abbhuggatā deva manussesu satta janāti

original: “Ke ca te, mahārājā”ti?
analyzed: ke ca te mahā rājā ati

original: “Sumano ca, bhante, mālākāro, ekasāṭako ca brāhmaṇo, puṇṇo ca bhatako, mallikā ca
analyzed: sumanaḥ ca bhante mālākāraḥ ekasāṭakaḥ ca brāhmaṇaḥ puṇṇaḥ ca bhatakaḥ mallikā ca

original: devī, gopālamātā ca devī, suppiyā ca upāsikā, puṇṇā ca dāsīti ime satta diṭṭhadhammasukhavedanīyā
analyzed: devī gopāla mātā ca devī suppiyā ca upāsikā puṇṇā ca dāsī iti ime satta diṭṭhadhamma sukha vedanīyā

original: sattā, kitti ca imesaṁ abbhuggatā devamanussesū”ti.
analyzed: ca imesam abbhuggatā deva manussesu uti

original: “Aparepi suyyanti nu kho atīte mānusakeneva sarīradehena tidasabhavanaṁ gatā”ti?
analyzed: apare pi nu khalu atīte mānusakena iva sarīra dehena tidasa bhavanam gatā ati

original: “Āma, bhante, suyyantī”ti.
analyzed: āma bhante suyyanti iti

original: “Ke ca te, mahārājā”ti?
analyzed: ke ca te mahā rājā ati

original: “Guttilo ca gandhabbo, sādhīno ca rājā, nimi ca rājā, mandhātā ca rājāti ime caturo janā suyyanti, teneva mānusakena sarīradehena tidasabhavanaṁ gatā”ti.
analyzed: guttilaḥ ca gandhabbaḥ sādhīnaḥ ca rājā nimi ca rājā mandhātā ca rājā ati ime caturaḥ janā tena iva mānusakena sarīra dehena tidasa bhavanam gatā ati

original: “Sucirampi kataṁ suyyati sukatadukkaṭanti?
analyzed: su ciram pi katam suyyati su kata dukkaṭanti

original: Sutapubbaṁ pana tayā, mahārāja, atīte vā addhāne vattamāne vā addhāne itthannāmassa dāne dīyamāne sakiṁ vā dvikkhattuṁ vā tikkhattuṁ vā mahāpathavī kampitā”ti?
analyzed: suta pubbam pana tayā mahā rāja atīte vā addhāne vattamāne vā addhāne itthannāmassa dāne dīyamāne sakim vā dvi khattum vā ti khattum vā mahā pathavī kampitā ati

original: “Na hi, bhante”ti.
analyzed: na hi bhantā iti

original: “Atthi me, mahārāja, āgamo adhigamo pariyatti savanaṁ sikkhābalaṁ sussūsā paripucchā
analyzed: atthi me mahā rāja āgamaḥ adhigamaḥ pariyatti savanam sikkhā balam sussūsā paripucchā

original: ācariyupāsanaṁ, mayāpi na sutapubbaṁ ‘itthannāmassa dāne dīyamāne sakiṁ vā dvikkhattuṁ
analyzed: ācariyupāsana mayā api na suta pubbam itthannāmassa dāne dīyamāne sakim vā dvikkhattu

original: vā tikkhattuṁ vā mahāpathavī kampitā’ti ṭhapetvā vessantarassa rājavasabhassa dānavaraṁ.
analyzed: vā tikkhattum vā mahā pathavī kampitā ati ṭhapetvā vessantarassa rājavasabhassa dānavara

original: Bhagavato ca, mahārāja, kassapassa, bhagavato ca sakyamuninoti dvinnaṁ buddhānaṁ
analyzed: bhagavato ca mahā rāja kassapassa bhagavato ca sakyamuninā iti dvinnam buddhāna

original: antare gaṇanapathaṁ vītivattā vassakoṭiyo atikkantā, tatthapi me savanaṁ natthi ‘itthannāmassa
analyzed: antare gaṇana patham vītivattāḥ vassa koṭiyaḥ atikkantāḥ tattha api me savanam natthi itthannāmassa

original: dāne dīyamāne sakiṁ vā dvikkhattuṁ vā tikkhattuṁ vā mahāpathavī kampitā’ti.
analyzed: dāne dīyamāne sakim vā dvi khattum vā ti khattum vā mahā pathavī kampitā ati

original: Na, mahārāja, tāvatakena vīriyena tāvatakena parakkamena mahāpathavī kampati, guṇabhārabharitā,
analyzed: na mahā rāja tāvatakena vīriyena tāvatakena parakkamena mahā pathavī kampati guṇa bhāra bharitā

original: mahārāja, sabbasoceyyakiriyaguṇabhārabharitā dhāretuṁ na visahantī mahāpathavī calati kampati pavedhati.
analyzed: mahā rāja sabba soceyya kiriya guṇa bhāra bharitā dhāretum na visahantī mahā pathavī calati kampati pavedhati

original: Yathā, mahārāja, sakaṭassa atibhārabharitassa nābhiyo ca nemiyo ca phalanti akkho bhijjati;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja sakaṭassa ati bhāra bharitassa nābhiyaḥ ca nemiyaḥ ca phalanti akkhaḥ bhijjati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, sabbasoceyyakiriyaguṇabhārabharitā mahāpathavī dhāretuṁ na visahantī calati kampati pavedhati.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja sabba soceyya kiriya guṇa bhāra bharitā mahā pathavī dhāretum na visahantī calati kampati pavedhati

original: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, gaganaṁ anilajalavegasañchāditaṁ ussannajalabhārabharitaṁ ativātena phuṭitattā nadati ravati gaḷagaḷāyati;
analyzed: yathā vā pana mahā rāja gaganam anila jala vega sañchāditam ussanna jala bhāra bharitam ati vātena phuṭi tattā nadati ravati gaḷagaḷāyati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, mahāpathavī rañño vessantarassa dānabalavipulaussannabhārabharitā dhāretuṁ na visahantī calati kampati pavedhati.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja mahā pathavī raññaḥ vessantarassa dāna bala vipula ussanna bhāra bharitā dhāretum na visahantī calati kampati pavedhati

original: Na hi, mahārāja, rañño vessantarassa cittaṁ rāgavasena pavattati, na dosavasena pavattati,
analyzed: na hi mahā rāja raññaḥ vessantarassa cittam rāga vasena pavattati na dosa vasena pavattati

original: na mohavasena pavattati, na mānavasena pavattati, na diṭṭhivasena pavattati, na kilesavasena
analyzed: na moha vasena pavattati na māna vasena pavattati na diṭṭhi vasena pavattati na kilesa vasena

original: pavattati, na vitakkavasena pavattati, na arativasena pavattati, atha kho dānavasena
analyzed: pavattati na vitakka vasena pavattati na arati vasena pavattati atha kho dāna vasena

original: bahulaṁ pavattati ‘kinti anāgatā yācakā mama santike āgaccheyyuṁ, āgatā ca yācakā
analyzed: bahulam pavattati kinti anāgatāḥ yācakāḥ mama santike āgaccheyyu āgatā ca yācakā

original: yathākāmaṁ labhitvā attamanā bhaveyyun’ti satataṁ samitaṁ dānaṁ pati mānasaṁ ṭhapitaṁ hoti.
analyzed: yathākāmam labhitvā atta manāḥ satatam samitam dānam pati mānasam hoti

original: Rañño, mahārāja, vessantarassa satataṁ samitaṁ dasasu ṭhānesu mānasaṁ ṭhapitaṁ hoti dame same khantiyaṁ saṁvare yame niyame akkodhe avihiṁsāyaṁ sacce soceyye.
analyzed: raññaḥ mahā rāja vessantarassa satatam samitam dasasu ṭhānesu mānasam ṭhapitam hoti dame same khantiyam savare yame niyame akkodhe a vihisāyam sacce soceyye

original: Rañño, mahārāja, vessantarassa kāmesanā pahīnā, bhavesanā paṭippassaddhā, brahmacariyesanāyayeva
analyzed: raññaḥ mahā rāja vessantarassa kāma īsanā pahīnā bhava īsanā paṭippassaddhā brahmacariya īsanā yayā iva

original: ussukkaṁ āpanno, rañño, mahārāja, vessantarassa attarakkhā pahīnā, sabbasattarakkhāya
analyzed: ussukkam āpannaḥ raññaḥ mahā rāja vessantarassa atta rakkhā pahīnā sabba satta rakkhāya

original: ussukkaṁ āpanno ‘kinti ime sattā samaggā assu arogā sadhanā dīghāyukā’ti bahulaṁyeva mānasaṁ pavattati.
analyzed: ussukkam āpannaḥ kinti ime sattā samaggāḥ assu arogā sa dhanā dīgha āyukā ati bahulayā iva mānasam pavattati

original: Dadamāno ca, mahārāja, vessantaro rājā taṁ dānaṁ na bhavasampattihetu deti, na dhanahetu
analyzed: dadamānaḥ ca mahā rāja vessantaraḥ rājā tam dānam na bhava sampatti hetu deti na dhana hetu

original: deti, na paṭidānahetu deti, na upalāpanahetu deti, na āyuhetu deti, na vaṇṇahetu
analyzed: deti na paṭidāna hetu deti na upalāpana hetu deti na āyu hetu deti na vaṇṇa hetu

original: deti, na sukhahetu deti, na balahetu deti, na yasahetu deti, na puttahetu deti, na
analyzed: deti na sukha hetu deti na bala hetu deti na yasa hetu deti na putta hetu deti na

original: dhītuhetu deti, atha kho sabbaññutañāṇahetu sabbaññutañāṇaratanassa kāraṇā evarūpe
analyzed: dhītu hetu deti atha kho sabbaññuta ñāṇa hetu sabbaññuta ñāṇa ratanassa kāraṇā evarūpe

original: atulavipulānuttare dānavare adāsi, sabbaññutaṁ patto ca imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi—
analyzed: atula vipula anuttare dāna vare adāsi sabbaññu tam patto ca imam gātham abhāsi

original: ‘Jāliṁ kaṇhājinaṁ dhītaṁ,
analyzed: jālim kaṇha ajinam dhīta

original: maddideviṁ patibbataṁ;
analyzed: maddidevim patibbata

original: Cajamāno na cintesiṁ,
analyzed: cajamānaḥ na cintesi

original: bodhiyāyeva kāraṇā’ti.
analyzed: kāraṇāti

original: Vessantaro, mahārāja, rājā akkodhena kodhaṁ jināti, asādhuṁ sādhunā jināti, kadariyaṁ dānena jināti, alikavādinaṁ saccena jināti, sabbaṁ akusalaṁ kusalena jināti.
analyzed: vessantaraḥ mahā rāja rājā akkodhena kodham jināti asādhum sādhunā jināti kadariyam dānena jināti alika vādinam saccena jināti sabbam akusalam kusalena jināti

original: Tassa evaṁ dadamānassa dhammānugatassa dhammasīsakassa dānanissandabalava vīriyavipulavipphārena
analyzed: tassa evam dadamānassa dhamma anugatassa dhamma sīsakassa dāna nissanda balava vīriya vipula vipphārena

original: heṭṭhā mahāvātā sañcalanti saṇikaṁ saṇikaṁ sakiṁ sakiṁ ākulākulā vāyanti onamanti
analyzed: heṭṭhā mahā vātā sañcalanti saṇikam saṇikam sakim sakim ākula ākulāḥ vāyanti onamanti

original: unnamanti vinamanti, chinnapattapādapā papatanti, gumbaṁ gumbaṁ valāhakā gagane sandhāvanti,
analyzed: unnamanti vinamanti chinna patta pādapāḥ papatanti gumbam gumbam valāhakāḥ gagane sandhāvanti

original: rajosañcitā vātā dāruṇā honti, gaganaṁ uppīḷitā vātā vāyanti, sahasā dhamadhamāyanti,
analyzed: rajaḥ sañcitāḥ vātāḥ dāruṇāḥ honti gaganam uppīḍitāḥ vātāḥ vāyanti sahasā dhamadhamāyanti

original: mahābhīmo saddo niccharati, tesu vātesu kupitesu udakaṁ saṇikaṁ saṇikaṁ calati, udake
analyzed: mahā bhīmaḥ saddaḥ niccharati tesu vātesu kupitesu udakam saṇikam saṇikam calati udake

original: calite khubbhanti macchakacchapā, yamakayamakā ūmiyo jāyanti, jalacarā sattā tasanti,
analyzed: calite khubbhanti maccha kacchapāḥ yamaka yamakāḥ ūmiyaḥ jāyanti jalacarā tasanti

original: jalavīci yuganaddho vattati, vīcinādo pavattati, ghorā bubbuḷā uṭṭhahanti, pheṇamālā
analyzed: yuga naddhaḥ vattati vīci nādaḥ pavattati ghorāḥ bubbuḷāḥ uṭṭhahanti pheṇa mālā

original: bhavanti, uttarati mahāsamuddo, disāvidisaṁ dhāvati udakaṁ, uddhaṁsotapaṭisotamukhā
analyzed: bhavanti uttarati mahā samuddaḥ disāvidisam dhāvati udake uddha sota paṭisota mukhā

original: sandanti saliladhārā, tasanti asurā garuḷā nāgā yakkhā, ubbijjanti ‘kiṁ nu kho, kathaṁ
analyzed: sandanti salila dhārā tasanti asurāḥ garuḷāḥ nāgāḥ yakkhāḥ ubbijjanti kim nu kho katha

original: nu kho, sāgaro viparivattatī’ti, gamanapathamesanti bhītacittā, khubhite luḷite jaladhāre
analyzed: nu kho sāgaraḥ viparivattati iti gamana patham esanti bhīta cittā khubhite luḷite jaladhāre

original: pakampati mahāpathavī sanagā sasāgarā, parivattati sinerugiri kūṭaselasikharo vinamamāno
analyzed: pakampati mahā pathavī sa nagā sa sāgarā parivattati sineru giri kūṭasela sikharaḥ vinamamānaḥ

original: hoti, vimanā honti ahinakulabiḷārakoṭṭhukasūkaramigapakkhino, rudanti yakkhā appesakkhā,
analyzed: hoti vimanāḥ honti ahi nakula biḷāra koṭṭhuka sūkara miga pakkhinaḥ rudanti yakkhāḥ appesakkhāḥ

original: hasanti yakkhā mahesakkhā kampamānāya mahāpathaviyā.
analyzed: hasanti yakkhāḥ mahesakkhāḥ kampamānāya mahā pathaviyā

original: Yathā, mahārāja, mahati mahāpariyoge uddhanagate udakasampuṇṇe ākiṇṇataṇḍule heṭṭhato
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja mahati mahā pariyoge uddhanagate udaka sampuṇṇe ākiṇṇa taṇḍule heṭṭhatas

original: aggi jalamāno paṭhamaṁ tāva pariyogaṁ santāpeti, pariyogo santatto udakaṁ santāpeti,
analyzed: aggi jalamānaḥ paṭhamam tāva pariyogam santāpeti pariyogaḥ santattaḥ udakam santāpeti

original: udakaṁ santattaṁ taṇḍulaṁ santāpeti, taṇḍulaṁ santattaṁ ummujjati nimujjati, bubbuḷakajātaṁ
analyzed: udakam santattam taṇḍulam santāpeti taṇḍulam santattam ummujjati nimujjati bubbuḷaka jāta

original: hoti, pheṇamālā uttarati;
analyzed: hoti pheṇa mālāḥ uttarati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, vessantaro rājā yaṁ loke duccajaṁ, taṁ caji, tassa taṁ duccajaṁ
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja vessantaraḥ rājā yam loke tam caji tassa tam duccaja

original: cajantassa dānassa sabhāvanissandena heṭṭhā mahāvātā dhāretuṁ na visahantā parikuppiṁsu,
analyzed: cajantassa dānassa sabhāva nissandena heṭṭhā mahā vātāḥ dhāretum na visahantā parikuppisu

original: mahāvātesu parikupitesu udakaṁ kampi, udake kampite mahāpathavī kampi, iti tadā mahāvātā
analyzed: mahā vātesu parikupitesu udakam kampi udake kampite mahā pathavī kampi iti tadā mahā vātā

original: ca udakañca mahāpathavī cāti ime tayo ekamanā viya ahesuṁ mahādānanissandena vipulabalavīriyena
analyzed: ca udakam ca mahā pathavī ca ati ime tayaḥ ekamanāḥ ahesum mahā dāna nissandena vipula bala vīriyena

original: natthediso, mahārāja, aññassa dānānubhāvo, yathā vessantarassa rañño mahādānānubhāvo.
analyzed: nattha īdisaḥ mahā rāja aññassa dāna anubhāvaḥ yathā vessantarassa raññaḥ mahā dāna anubhāvaḥ

original: Yathā, mahārāja, mahiyā bahuvidhā maṇayo vijjanti.
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja mahiyā bahuvidhāḥ maṇayaḥ vijjanti

original: Seyyathidaṁ—
analyzed: seyyathida

original: indanīlo mahānīlo jotiraso veḷuriyo ummāpuppho sirīsapuppho manoharo sūriyakanto
analyzed: indanīlaḥ mahānīlaḥ jotirasaḥ veḷuriyaḥ ummāpupphaḥ sirīsapupphaḥ manoharaḥ sūriyakanto

original: candakanto vajiro khajjopanako phussarāgo lohitaṅgo masāragalloti, ete sabbe atikkamma
analyzed: candakantaḥ vajiraḥ khajjopanakaḥ phussarāgaḥ lohitaṅgaḥ masāragallaḥ ti ete sabbe atikkamma

original: cakkavattimaṇi aggamakkhāyati, cakkavattimaṇi, mahārāja, samantā yojanaṁ obhāseti.
analyzed: cakkavatti maṇi aggam akkhāyati cakkavatti maṇi mahā rāja samantā yojanam obhāseti

original: Evameva kho, mahārāja, yaṁ kiñci mahiyā dānaṁ vijjati api asadisadānaṁ paramaṁ, taṁ
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yam kiñci mahiyā dānam vijjati api a sadisa dānam

original: sabbaṁ atikkamma vessantarassa rañño mahādānaṁ aggamakkhāyati, vessantarassa, mahārāja,
analyzed: sabbam atikkamma vessantarassa raññaḥ mahādānam aggam akkhāyati vessantarassa mahā rāja

original: rañño mahādāne dīyamāne sattakkhattuṁ mahāpathavī kampitā”ti.
analyzed: raññaḥ mahā dāne dīyamāne satta kkhattum mahā pathavī kampitā ati

original: “Acchariyaṁ, bhante nāgasena, buddhānaṁ, abbhutaṁ, bhante nāgasena, buddhānaṁ, yaṁ
analyzed: acchariya bhante nāgasena buddhāna abbhuta bhante nāgasena buddhāna ya

original: tathāgato bodhisatto samāno asamo lokena evaṅkhanti evaṁcitto evaṁadhimutti evaṁadhippāyo,

original: bodhisattānaṁ, bhante nāgasena, parakkamo dakkhāpito, pāramī ca jinānaṁ bhiyyo obhāsitā,
analyzed: bodhisattāna bhante nāgasena parakkamaḥ dakkhāpito pāramī ca jinānam bhiyyas obhāsitā

original: cariyaṁ caratopi tāva tathāgatassa sadevake loke seṭṭhabhāvo anudassito.
analyzed: cariyam carataḥ api tāva tathāgatassa sa devake loke seṭṭha bhāvaḥ anudassito

original: Sādhu, bhante nāgasena, thomitaṁ jinasāsanaṁ, jotitā jinapāramī, chinno titthiyānaṁ
analyzed: sādhu bhante nāgasena thomitam jina sāsana jotitā jina pāramī

original: vādagaṇṭhi, bhinno parāpavādakumbho, pañho gambhīro uttānīkato, gahanaṁ agahanaṁ
analyzed: vāda gaṇṭhi bhinno para apavāda kumbho pañhaḥ gambhīraḥ utta anīkataḥ gahanam a gahana

original: kataṁ, sammā laddhaṁ jinaputtānaṁ nibbāhanaṁ, evametaṁ, gaṇivarapavara, tathā sampaṭicchāmā”ti.
analyzed: sammā laddham jinaputtānam nibbāhana evam eta gaṇi vara pavara tathā sampaṭicchāma ati

original: Pathavicalanapañho catuttho.
analyzed: pathavicalana pañho catuttho
